3 from std_msgs.msg import String
4 from webots_ros.srv import get_bool, set_int, set_float

6 import twizy_webots.robot as robot

9 class Robot:
10  def __init__(self, model=None):
11  self.model = self._fetch_model() if model is None else model
12 
13  def _fetch_model(self, timeout=None):
14  return rospy.wait_for_message('/model_name', String, timeout).data
15 
16  def service_name(self, srv):
17  return f'{self.model}/{srv}'
18 
19  def topic_name(self, topic):
20  return f'{self.model}/{topic}'
21 
22  def service(self, srv, srv_type, wait=True, persistent=False):
23  srv_name = self.service_name(srv)
24  proxy = rospy.ServiceProxy(srv_name, srv_type, persistent)
25  if wait:
26  proxy.wait_for_service()
27  return proxy
28 
29  def call_enable(self, device, ups):
30  mspt = int(round(1000.0 / ups))
31  return self.service(f'{device}/enable', set_int)(mspt)
32 
33  def set_position(self, device, wait=True, persistent=False):
34  srv_name = f'{device}/set_position'
35  return self.service(srv_name, set_float, wait, persistent)
36 
37  def set_velocity(self, device, wait=True, persistent=False, initial=0):
38  self.set_position(device)(float('inf'))
39  srv_name = f'{device}/set_velocity'
40  proxy = self.service(srv_name, set_float, wait, persistent)
41  if proxy and initial is not None:
42  proxy(initial)
43  return proxy
